alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 14 at 3:22AM PST until November 16 at 7:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected for inland areas near the foothills of the mountains.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
